content.title: 100 Discord OG's
content.text: First 100 members of our Discord server recieves an OG role, with access to future giveaways and more!

content.title: Holder Discord Role
content.text: Anyone who holds a Trauma Llama will get access to custom Discord channels where we will hold future giveaways for Llama holders.

content.title: Club Member Merch
content.text: Member merch with the option to print the Trauma Llama you own on it.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to NidderDale Llamas.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to AFSP.

content.title: Llama Raffle
content.text: Anyone who minted between #1-2222 are automatically entered into a free Trauma Llama raffle.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to NidderDale Llamas.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to AFSP.

content.title: Club Member Area
content.text: Start planning the development of a Trauma Llamas holder only area on our website. View all of the Trauma Llamas currently in your wallet along with their traits and stats.

content.title: Llama Raffle
content.text: Anyone who minted between #2223-4444 are automatically entered into a free Trauma Llamas raffle.

content.text: Donate $3,125 to NidderDale Llamas.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to AFSP.

content.title: $30k Community Wallet
content.text: $30,000 is added to a community wallet. This will be used for giveaways and other community member competitions. Stay tuned for more information!

content.title: Liquidity Pool
content.text: We will look at opening a liquidity pool for your Trauma Llamas on NFT20.io

content.title: Llama Gallery
content.text: Start planning development of an interactive and sortable gallery of all of the Trauma Llamas.

content.title: Llama Raffle
content.text: Anyone who minted between #4445-6666 are automatically entered into a free Trauma Llamas raffle.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to NidderDale Llamas.

content.title: Donation
content.text: Donate $3,125 to AFSP.

content.title: 1 of 1 auctions
content.text: Trauma Llamas special edition 1 of 1 NFT will be put up for auction on OpenSea.

content.title: Gen 2 NFT
content.text: The team behind Trauma Llamas will start the development of Gen 2 NFTs.

content.title: Gen 2 Mobile Game
content.text: Together with the Gen 2 NFT drop, we will work on developing a mobile game where you can play as your Gen 1 or Gen 2 Trauma Llama.

content.title: Trauma Llama VTuber Model
content.text: We will commission a high quality Live 2D Trauma Llama vtuber model to be our official spokesperson.

content.title: Llama raffle
content.text: Anyone who minted between #6667-8888 are automatically entered into a free Trauma Llamas raffle.
